    • Method Detail

      • storeData

        boolean storeData(long snapshotId,
                  long seq,
                  long timestampNs,
                  ISerializationProcessor.SerializedModuleType type,
                  int instanceId,
                  net.openhft.chronicle.bytes.WriteBytesMarshallable obj)
        Serialize state into a storage (disk, NAS, etc).

        Method is threadsafe - called from each module's thread upon receiving serialization command.

        Method is synchronous - returning true value only when the data was safely stored into independent storage.

        Parameters:
        snapshotId - - unique snapshot id
        seq - - sequence of serialization
        timestampNs - - timestamp
        type - - module (risk engine or matching engine)
        instanceId - - module instance number (starting from 0 for each module type)
        obj - - serialized data
        Returns:
        true if serialization succeeded, false otherwise

      • loadData

        <T> T loadData(long snapshotId,
               ISerializationProcessor.SerializedModuleType type,
               int instanceId,
               Function<net.openhft.chronicle.bytes.BytesIn,T> initFunc)
        Deserialize state from a storage (disk, NAS, etc).

        Method is threadsafe - called from each module's thread on creation.

        Type Parameters:
        T - - module implementation class
        Parameters:
        snapshotId - - unique snapshot id
        type - - module (risk engine or matching engine)
        instanceId - - module instance number (starting from 0)
        initFunc - - creator lambda function
        Returns:
        constructed object, or throws exception

      • writeToJournal

        void writeToJournal(OrderCommand cmd,
                    long dSeq,
                    boolean eob)
             throws IOException
        Write command into journal
        Parameters:
        cmd - - command to write
        dSeq - - disruptor sequence
        eob - - if true, journal should commit all previous data synchronously
        Throws:
        IOException - - can throw in case of writing issue (will stop exchange core from responding)

      • enableJournaling

        void enableJournaling(long afterSeq,
                      ExchangeApi api)
        Activate journal
        Parameters:
        afterSeq - - enable only after specified sequence, for lower sequences no writes to journal
        api - - API reference

      • findAllSnapshotPoints

        NavigableMap<Long,SnapshotDescriptor> findAllSnapshotPoints()
        get all available snapshots
        Returns:
        sequential map of snapshots (TODO can be a tree)

      • replayJournalStep

        void replayJournalStep(long snapshotId,
                       long seqFrom,
                       long seqTo,
                       ExchangeApi api)
        Replay journal
        Parameters:
        snapshotId - - snapshot id (important for tree history)
        seqFrom - - starting command sequence (exclusive)
        seqTo - - ending command sequence (inclusive)
        api - - API reference

      • replayJournalFull

        long replayJournalFull(InitialStateConfiguration initialStateConfiguration,
                       ExchangeApi api)

      • replayJournalFullAndThenEnableJouraling

        void replayJournalFullAndThenEnableJouraling(InitialStateConfiguration initialStateConfiguration,
                                             ExchangeApi exchangeApi)

      • checkSnapshotExists

        boolean checkSnapshotExists(long snapshotId,
                            ISerializationProcessor.SerializedModuleType type,
                            int instanceId)
        Check if underlying snapshot file exists
        Parameters:
        snapshotId - - unique snapshot id
        type - - module (risk engine or matching engine)
        instanceId - - module instance number (starting from 0 for each module type)
        Returns:
        Path the resolved snapshot path
